tasks.dist:config:users: mkdir -p src/dist && sops --decrypt config/users.cue.encrypted | cue eval --out json --outfile src/dist/users.json --force -
tasks.dist:config:dns-entries: mkdir -p src/dist && sops --decrypt config/dns-entries.cue.encrypted | cue eval --out json --outfile src/dist/dns-entries.json --force -
tasks.dist:config: deno task dist:config:users & deno task dist:config:dns-entries
tasks.deploy: deno task dist:config && deployctl deploy --prod --project netlify-ddns --token $(pass deno-deploy-token | head -n 1) --include=src src/main.ts
